column4: hi im having some trouble installing a program it was only avalible in source code format so i had to compile install it. Here is the contents of what i can tell from the errors is the offending file http://rafb.net/p/3ZgHYb54.html and here are the errors recieved when compiling http://rafb.net/p/RmWfCg51.html. Im fairly new to linux so sorry if this problem is really stupid
what are you trying to build?
give me a sec and I'll try and duplicate the problem
actually, doing a quick google for tuxnes, it looks like it hasn't been updated in seven years...
isn't there a nes emulator in the repos?
oh right well ill try another nes emu is there any you reccomend
yes there is but it emulates in a tiny window
I've got that thing to compile, whether it works or not is another story
so far if you comment out the "perror" lines and replace them with "printf("some message\n");" it compiles
ok thanks but i have a new problem im trying a new emu but it says its not there what could be causing this http://i27.tinypic.com/10ylxys.jpg
is it possible that the fwnes file in your directory there is really a script, with a path to something that doesn't exist?
yes it could be ill check it out
